name: PHASEPushStreamNodeDefinition
desc: A node that plays a sequence of audio buffers.

items.name: init(mixerDefinition: PHASEMixerDefinition, format: AVAudioFormat)
items.desc: Creates a node definition for audio streams.

items.name: init(mixerDefinition: PHASEMixerDefinition, format: AVAudioFormat, identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a named node definition for audio streams.

items.name: var format: AVAudioFormat
items.desc: The format of the audio stream data.

items.name: var normalize: Bool
items.desc: An option that resizes loudness of the audio stream for consistency.
